backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing the addition of mobile number 9973279335 in the global footer and listing related files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Map of frontend file paths to their descriptions summarizing component behavior, hooks, styling, and app structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, component, and utility layers defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container, loading main.tsx, and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing roles, login, product/order state, admin notifications, and rendering layout with footer and views.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for adding, editing, and deleting products with image upload, validation, dialogs, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/HowToAddProducts: Instructional card explaining steps for adding products with icons and a tip alert.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form validating credentials and assigning customer or admin role based on username/password.
frontend/src/components/OrdersPanel.tsx: Admin panel component that groups and displays orders by customer and provides a clear-history confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Product listing UI that sorts by sales, filters by search, and lets users place orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: LocalStorage-backed hook for loading, adding, and clearing customer orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: LocalStorage-backed hook for loading, adding, updating, and deleting products with migration for legacy items.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main app.
frontend/src/types/order.ts: Order type defining product name, timestamp, and optional customer name.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Product type defining id, name, price, and optional image.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config setting dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, and utilities plus custom keyframes and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current features, and pending feature requests for adding a mobile number to the app footer.
